relation: Rules and Announcements Please Read! OOC Please Read!

Hello and Goodbye - 1 Viewing New Member? Introduce yourself! You don't have to let us know when you are making a new account to play a second or third character, but you can if you like. guest friendly OOC Have to go away for a while? Be sure to stop by here to make arrangements for your character/s so the rest of us can keep playing. That sounds horrible, I know...

Doctor Who Reference Materials Found a comprehensive Doctor Who website? Looking for Guidance? Information, character lists, episode guides... Drop on by! guest friendly OOC Sub-boards: Teams & Organizations, Alien Species, Linguistics
General Discussion This is where people can talk about anything. guest friendly OOC Sub-boards: Whoniverse Chat, Fun and Games, Theology, Religion, Spirituality, etc.
All things "HELP!" - 1 Viewing From technical difficulties to inspirational troubles- don't hesitate to ask! guest friendly OOC
Arts Post your original art, prose or graphic. Come get help resizing your signatures as well. Original graphic art in link form only please.

Sub-boards: Character Sign Up and Creation, Approved Characters, Adopt a Character, Pending or Denied Character Applications, Character Graveyard 474 2,284 Callea O'Connell by Fitz Kreiner Jul 25, 2015 10:52:15 GMT -5 Open / Closed Thread Plotting & Planning This is where you can learn about various RP threads that have started, or are about to start. Some may be open for anyone to join in (open), while others may have specific characters tagged (closed). This is also where you can post that you have started or are planning to start an RP thread and are in need of other characters to join in. This
